title: Smoked Paprika and Cheddar Vegan Cheese Ball
directions: Place all the ingredients except for the pecans in the bowl of a food processor. Blend until smooth, adding water as needed. Scoop out and form into 2 balls and roll in the chopped pecans. Wrap each in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm.
ingredients: 3 cups cashews, soaked for at least 4 hours and drained
⅓ cup water, more as needed
Black pepper, to taste (I used ¼ teaspoon)
